T02D2857:196b-1: panytsa de wa ta th'a ga to lo ka shva ra s'abta nam /
T02D2857:196b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug lha lnga'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2857:196b-4: rgyal ba lnga la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2857:196b-5: shin tu rnam dag dang ba'i mtshor //
T02D2857:196b-6: rab mdzes sdong bu lnga ldan steng //
T02D2857:196b-7: rnam snang rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
T02D2857:196b-9: sa rigs rnam dag sna tshogs gzugs //
T02D2857:196b-10: dngos gcig rgyal ba lnga la 'dud //
T02D2857:196b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa khyad par can la gnas pas /
T02D2857:196b-12: snying rje chen po mdun du byas la /
T02D2857:196b-13: thog ma kho nar chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rab tu bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2857:196b-14: gdod nas ma skyes 'od gsal ba //
T02D2857:196b-15: gang shar nyid na ngo bo med //
T02D2857:196b-16: chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid de //
T02D2857:196b-17: bla ma'i drin gyis rtogs par 'gyur //
T02D2857:196b-18: gang 'di ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i chos 'di
T02D2857:196b-19: dag ni zab pa'i phyir rtogs par dka' bas mi
T02D2857:197a-1: po ni nges par sdug bsngal ba'o zhes brtags nas /
T02D2857:197a-2: dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor mngon par bskyod gyur pas //
T02D2857:197a-3: skye bo nyon mongs sgrib tshogs sprin gyi phung po shin tu mthug pos gtums gyur pa //
T02D2857:197a-4: tsham tshom med par drag po'i shugs kyis kun du dral zhing yongs su gtor //
T02D2857:197a-5: de yi thabs gyur thugs rje'i dbyings skyes sna tshogs mdzad pa dbyer med cig car bsgrub pa yi //
T02D2857:197a-6: mgon po dam pa rigs kyi lha lnga dri ma lnga sbyong las lnga bsgrub cing stobs la sogs //
T02D2857:197a-7: de la dbus sdogs sdong 'dab bcas //
T02D2857:197a-8: zla ba'i 'khor la gsal ba la //
T02D2857:197a-9: me long gzugs ltar 'bru lnga bsam //
T02D2857:197a-10: phrin las la sbyar skur bskyed do //
T02D2857:197a-11: rnam par snang mdzad ni kha ba'i mdog can ji
T02D2857:197a-12: skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can hr'i: 'i snying po
T02D2857:197a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' ni nam mkha'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can /
T02D2857:197a-15: h'um gi snying po can rdo rjes mtshan pa'o //
T02D2857:197a-16: rin chen 'byung ldan ni gser btso ma'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can /
T02D2857:197a-17: tr'am gi snying po can rin po ches mtshan pa'o //
T02D2857:197a-18: 'od dpag med ni me lce 'bar ba'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can //
T02D2857:197a-19: hr'i: 'i snying po can padmas mtshan pa'o //
T02D2857:197a-20: don yod grub pa ni s'a lu ljang ba'i mdog can ji skad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya can /
T02D2857:197a-21: aa:'i snying po can ral gris mtshan pa'o //
T02D2857:197a-22: 'di dag dbus bcas phyogs rnams su //
T02D2857:197a-23: rim bzhin las la mdzad pa la //
T02D2857:197a-24: brtson pas ting nge 'dzin bzhugs pa //
T02D2857:197a-25: bdag sbyang ba dang gzhan sbyang gnyis //
T02D2857:197a-26: aom aa sva pa ra dzny'a na pi shuddha kra sa h'um /
T02D2857:197a-28: thugs rje chen po lha lnga'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2857:197a-29: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shr'i mi tra a'a na nda'i gdams pa rdzogs so /
